Tables

Tables are meant to show information in a clear way.

Simple table

Example

The following html

Leads to

Head 1Head 2Head 3
Body 1.1Body 1.2Body 1.3
Body 2.1Body 2.2Body 2.3
Body 3.1Body 3.2Body 3.3

Double entry table

Example

The following html

Leads to

Column 1Column 2Column 3
Row 1Item 1.1Item 1.2Item 1.3
Row 2Item 2.1Item 2.2Item 2.3
Row 3Item 3.1Item 3.2Item 3.3

Check table

Example

The following html

Leads to

data = { "column 1": [ "row 1", "row 3" ], "column 2": [ "row 1", "row 2", "row 3" ], "column 3": [ "row 1", "row 2" ] };
column 1column 2column 3
row 1checkcheckcheck
row 2checkcheck
row 3checkcheck

Editable cells

Example

The following html

Leads to

Column 1Column 2
Row 1
valuemode_edit
value
string
